title: Cant open lol at all
body: I am having issues opening lol. I open it up the lol logo comes up and then nothing so I cant even get to the screen to press launch, I am not on a mac, I am wondering if anyone else is having the same issues or if anyone knows a solution.

replies.body: It's not a problem with the patcher. I was playing last night and the patch installed fine, but I tried to get on today and I can't even get to the page to press launch to log in.

Have you tried waiting for five minutes? Sometimes it's just because it's patching the patcher itself, and that takes time.

If that doesn't work, try launching the patcher in admin mode.
